page.title: 10THE BUILDING OF THE MOUNT
page.content:
Cormoran lived in a forest by the sea. He wanted to build a large hill out of granite As he was a lazy giant he made his wife Cormelian collect all the stones. She also had to travel farthest away to find the best granite. One day the giant had fallen asleep, so she decided to get the greenstones which were nearer. When she was half way to the Mount the giant woke up and saw her. He kicked her and she dropped the stone and ran into the forest to hide until he had finished building the Mount by himself.
The stone is now called the Chapel Rock, because many years later a chapel was built on it. It is a large greenstone rock on the beach at Marazion, near the end of the causeway.
